record.title: HONORING THE LIFE AND ACCOMPLISHMENTS OF GIAN CARLO MENOTTI AND RECOGNIZING THE SUCCESS OF THE SPOLETO FESTIVAL USA

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H. Con. Res. 68, which was received from the House.

record.chair: The clerk will report the concurrent resolution by title.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the concurrent resolution.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to; that the preamble be agreed to; that the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table; and that any statements relating to the resolution be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
